column3: It's past one o'clock and I'm out of time
column4: 已经过了一点，我已经没有时间了
column5: Can't undo the lock and no key to find
column6: 解不开时间的锁，也没有它的钥匙
column7: Looking all around at the station
column10: 我们是在时间中被冻结了吗？
column13: To understand how I can hear your mind
column14: 我也并不理解为什么我能和你的心灵沟通
column15: Racing on and on through the years of time
column17: Future is their home and I need to
column18: 未来是人们的归属，我也需要
column20: 走向属于我自己的未来
column25: I've never had an issue with this machine in motion
column26: 但我以前从来没有在这台机器运转的时候遇到过问题
column27: The clocks in the walls are numb
column28: 那些挂在墙上的，刻板的钟
column29: And I've been waiting here for so long
column31: 我已经在这里等了很久很久了
column34: 听着，我这里有一个需要你帮忙解决的问题
column35: And you're the only one who knows this room has a function
column36: 你现在是唯一一个知道这个房间有这个功能（把“我”锁在时间中）的人了
column38: 我已经被锁住八十年了

column40: 一直过着没有你的生活
